getting-started/installation.description: This guide covers installing the AURA blockchain binary.

getting-started/overview.description: AURA is a purpose-built blockchain for credential verification, built on the Cosmos SDK.

getting-started/quickstart.description: Get started with AURA testnet in minutes.

index.title: Introduction
index.description: AURA is a Cosmos SDK blockchain for credential verification and identity management.

mvp/about.title: About AURA MVP
mvp/about.description: The AURA MVP (Minimum Viable Product) is the first public release of the AURA blockchain, focusing on core credential verification functionality.

mvp/cli-reference.description: Quick reference for MVP module CLI commands.

mvp/endpoints.description: Public endpoints for the AURA MVP testnet.

mvp/modules.title: AURA MVP Modules
mvp/modules.description: The MVP release includes 12 essential modules for credential verification on the AURA blockchain.

operations/node-operator.title: Node Operator Guide
operations/node-operator.description: This guide covers running and maintaining an AURA full node.

operations/troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
operations/troubleshooting.description: Common issues and solutions for AURA node operators.

operations/upgrades.description: This guide covers upgrading AURA nodes between versions.

operations/validator-setup.title: Validator Setup Guide
operations/validator-setup.description: This guide walks through setting up a validator node on the AURA MVP testnet.

security/policy.description: AURA takes security seriously. This document outlines our security practices and vulnerability disclosure process.
